name: feq3d
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0

stmt.origin: syl(w0, wb(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c0, c1, c3)), wceq(c2, c3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c0, c1, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c2, c3))
-| wi(wceq(c2, c3), wb(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c0, c1, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c0, c1, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c2, c3))
-| wi(wceq(c2, c3), wb(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c0, c1, c3)))

body.origin: |- wi(wceq(c2, c3), wb(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c0, c1, c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wf(c0, c1, c2), wf(c0, c1, c3)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c2, c3))

comment: Equality deduction for functions. (Contributed by AV, 1-Jan-2020.)
